com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query

Class SimpleVertexQueryProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.SimpleVertexQueryProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Entry>

    public class SimpleVertexQueryProcessor
extends Object
implements Iterable<Entry>
    This is a premature optimization of QueryProcessor for a special type of VertexQuery under certain restrictive conditions. This Iterable is not thread-safe.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
